think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob: 'thread_cache_size'. 2. Understand the function of the knob: It is used to specify the number of threads that the server should cache for reuse. 3. Identify if there are any special values: Yes, a value of 0 is special. 4. Understand the function of the special value: When set to 0, no thread caching will occur, which is a different function compared to its regular operation.
